title: First Entry
entry: Hello world! I am testing out my first journal app with a backend that actually stores data!! Consistent data storage is one of the biggest ways of learning development because that's essentially what a backend does :)

title: Today Started Badly
entry:
Hey Journal, I find it much easier to journal on the computer because I'm just so much faster typing on a keyboard. Last night I hit my pen and "chilled" for a bit.

I woke up this morning earlier than normal. It was 7:15 by the time I finally got out of bed, and I didn't have to rush, which was quite nice. I had breakfast, which was nice. Then grandma came out and told me it was garbage day, and I should probably take the trash out, so I did. Then the driveway needed to be shoveled because the plow had come by, so I did that. Just like that all my free time that I had allocated for waking up earlier was gone. I couldn't sit and enjoy my morning time, which frustrated me to my core. 

I came to the office, and was the first one here. Mike, Tim, and Josh are here aswell now so I should probably get to work soon. I will update you, I'm happy you're here journal.
